review_text: It was a nice, quiet accommodation in Decatur. Easy walking distance to coffee, restaurants, bars, etc.
Great spot. So close to the some amazing bars etc yet very chilled. I will be back

Look, we have a house in the area that i needed to clear out as we are renting it out. I know the area well and it is a fantastic location if you're visiting Decatur. I had the apartment as i needed to work and do teams calls with two European countries. The wifi was great, the office space ideal, facilities great. As always with this stuff, its all about sensible perspective. I will need to bounce back and forth and won't be looking for anywhere else. It helps that Raging Burrito is close 😂
Unbelievable find and really friendly hosts. They took the time to put together a folder with recommendations that were spot on. If I find myself in ATL again I’ll definitely come back.
Lovely place in quiet neighborhood. Walkable to Decatur square :)
Extremely comfortable and clean. I enjoyed my stay and would book it again. Bruce was really nice!
Great stay with my baby and toddler! Would happily return!

This was the perfect home base for a busy weekend. After a brief, friendly welcome from Bruce to make sure we had everything we needed, we found the space quiet and private, surrounded by trees. My friend had the bedroom, while I slept on the futon bed which Bruce set up. Both beds were very comfortable, with nice spreads. The bathroom was clean and we appreciated the hair dryer. One note to anyone sensitive to light: bring an eye mask if you’ll be on the futon, as it’s under the skylight. Overall, a great experience in a lovely setting, close to eateries and very walkable.

This was a great find!
Close to everything we needed, but quiet and peaceful.
Hosts were very flexible with our needs.
Good memories!
Great location. Easy to find and clear instructions to get inside. Plentiful space, clean and comfortable. Everything you need. Easily walked to coffee and restaurants. Safe area!

Wonderful stay here in Decatur- the perfect home base while visiting friends and family! Really appreciated Bruce’s local restaurant guide, and great walkable access to the main square. Highly recommended!
This was our third stay at Bruce and Karen's place. That should say more than any review I can write. we love the location and the place.
A cute decatur guest house. Would definitely recommend.
Really comfortable to stay, nice sofa, lovely trees and a cute cat always visit

We enjoyed staying in Bruce and Karen's Garden Apartment. Bruce was friendly and welcoming. The apartment was very clean and matched the photos. Check-in was easy. They went to the trouble to set up the futon for our son. We enjoyed the short walk to all of the action around the square in Decatur, including many excellent restaurants and some cute shops.
Nice stay in a beautiful area, close walk to Decatur restaurants
Beautiful stay!

The place was as described and is close to awesome restaurants as well as lovely downtown Decatur. Bruce and Karen were lovely and very engaging. Very lovely people, easy to talk to and have a great place to stay.

This was a marvelous spot to escape from the hubbub of a conference I was attending in the main area of Decatur. The walk wasn't nothing, but very pleasant to move through the neighborhood into the more bustling area. So many amazing restaurants nearby! It was also always easy to get a Lyft in case of poor weather or tired feet.
The welcome/info packet is one of the most personable I've ever encountered! I loved the restaurant descriptions and felt so welcomed by the friendly tone, even through writing. The space itself met and exceeded exactly my needs.
The only surprise was how thin the door was between my bathroom/desk area and what I presume is the kitchen in the main house. This wasn't a problem as I was out most of the time, but it was just slightly less private than I imagined, and I hope my morning routine of listening to a podcast over coffee didn't disturb!
Great location, quick and responsive communication, well equipped space. Enjoyed the visit and will be back.
This was our second time staying at Bruce And Karen’s place. It’s a great spot and we love it. Bruce is always helpful and quick to respond when we need anything. We will be back!
Great spot! Lovely home. Easy to settle in and felt super comfortable.
Great place, very convenient.

We couldn't have asked for a more pleasant stay. The lodging is in a very convenient location, close to all the Decatur attractions that interested us. Bruce and Karen gave us plenty of detailed information for check-in, and the accommodations were extremely clean, modern and comfortable. I had only a brief personal encounter with Bruce, who I found to be a most congenial and interesting person who's lived in enough interesting places to form a charming world view. We'd stay there again in a heartbeat.

It is always a delight to stay at an Airbnb that is a gem. This is! Very spacious private apartment in an ideal location for downtown Decatur. Bruce and Karen were exceptional hosts: gracious, responsive, and clear.
Bruce and Karen's unit was perfect for us. It is in a lovely setting and close to all that downtown Decatur has to offer. The apartment is spacious, quiet, and well-furnished. We hope to go back.
Very cozy and relaxing. Will definitely come back if we are in the area again.
We had a lovely weekend at Bruce and Karen's home!

Bruce and Karen's place is very charming, bright, and comfortable. I especially appreciated the little touches like having coffee grounds and creamers in the fridge and the large bottles of paraben/sulfide-free shampoo & conditioners in the bathroom!
Great location and great amenities. Bruce was super friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!

Thank you Bruce and Karen for an excellent stay! Beautiful apartment with stunning views of the wonderful green backyard. Very clean, very comfortable, and very close to restaurants, shops, and Marta. Truly a wonderful stay! Bruce is the friendliest host I’ve ever had. Thanks for an amazing stay!!

This is a beautiful property. We were attending a dance event in downtown Decatur, and it was very convenient to be staying only a few blocks away. The property is a short walk from two MARTA stops, which was another plus. The hosts were extremely accommodating and flexible.
This is a gem of a stay. Close enough to easily walk to downtown Decatur, but far enough to feel private and quiet. I loved the space and location.
Place was great. Location was central to downtown and the apartment was immaculately clean.
we were a family of 4. this place fit right into our needs.

Enjoyed our stay
Comfortable accommodation
Short walk to Decatur Square
Very satisfied
Very great location!
My husband and I always try to reserve Bruce and Karen’s when in Decatur.

Our hosts were very friendly and responsive to inquiries. Instructions were easy and no issues at all. Appreciated the cleanliness, shampoos, nice towels, comfortable bed and temperature. (If one plans to do much cooking they were a bit low on pans and such, but it was fine for breakfast and they supplied coffee and filters, etc.). Very nice stay.
Very comfortable! Easy to cook.
Comfortable place in a quiet neighborhood. Clean and well equipped.
Great spot - worked well for my partner, our 7 year old, and myself. Would definitely recommend!

Bruce and Karen's place was perfect for our weekend in Atlanta! They were responsive and proactive in reaching out to us. We often stay at a hotel when visiting our family in the area, but will definitely think about coming back here! Very peaceful and quiet location that is accessible to Marta as well as many restaurants and locally-owned shops.

My husband and I spent 4 nights at Bruce and Karen’s place. The apartment was the perfect size for us. The living area has a lovely skylight and overlooks the backyard. They have a very nice deck. It was very hot outside but their AC worked perfectly so we were nice and cool in the apartment. The location is walking distance to the lovely square in Decatur where there are lots of great bars and restaurants. Decatur is a great location from which to explore the rest of Atlanta. We will be back and will bring our daughter as there is room for a third person. Great find!
We really enjoyed our stay. The bed was so comfortable. The bathroom was clean. More than enough shampoo and conditioner to use. I sincerely recommend this place.
A beautiful space. Walking distance to town. Very peaceful.
Perfect for our stay! Host was very responsive and place was as described
Such a lovely home and perfect for our needs. My family really enjoyed their stay. Bruce & Karen are wonderful hosts!

My family went to Decatur for a wedding and wanted to stay someplace close to everything but with the added benefit of having a kitchen and more room to spread out. Bruce was extremely helpful and responsive and the location could not have been better. Excellent value for the price and would highly recommend to others!

We had a wonderful stay at Bruce and Karen’s apartment. The space was comfortable and roomy with lots of thoughtful amenities like soap and coffee creamer. They had a handmade restaurant guide with their recommendations which was very useful and fun to go through. We enjoyed trying their recommendations. The apartment is an easy walk to plenty of restaurants and two Marta stops. Everything was perfectly clean and exactly as described. We didn’t meet Karen, but Bruce was very friendly and kind. One of the best airbnbs I’ve ever stayed at!

The accommodations were perfect for us. The apartment was clean, comfortable, quiet and within walking distance to many places of interest. It met all our needs and I heartily recommend this place to anyone planning to visit Decatur.

The apartment was just as described and pictured. It’s attached to the main house, but private.
The neighborhood is quiet and the apartment is at the back of the house, far from the street.
The main commercial area of the town is easily walkable as is the MARTA station. Their restaurant guide is expansive and very helpful.
They provided a nice selection of coffee and tea and a few condiments.
We met Bruce as we were checking out. Very friendly. We would stay there again
Very nice place with great hosts!
We loved our stay — such great ambiance and perfect if you need to work from home at all. We loved being such a short walk from Decatur. Would 100% recommend
Great apartment near downtown Decatur! Beautiful indoor and outdoor space in a very quiet setting, a short walk from Decatur square. Had a wonderful stay.

Bruce and Karen’s apartment was spacious, clean and comfortable. Lots of windows and sky lights made the place sunny and bright which we loved. It was conveniently located, walking distance to restaurants and train station. Very easy travel to and from the airport. We will definitely stay there again.
Spacious spot in a super location. Not lacking for anything. I'll be back.

Very comfortable- sweet neighborhood. Walkable to downtown. Quiet. Was what I’d been hoping for.
You can hear the train - which runs fairly infrequently, and which I found charming.
The apartment was as described, very clean and tidy. I enjoyed how quiet & private it was.
We loved our stay! Beds were comfy, bathroom was big and there was a desk with another mirror, which these 3 girls appreciated! We went to many great nearby restaurants and coffee shops.
This is our second visit and we are always so comfortable here. Great location, great hosts, very nice space, very private deck and backyard. we'll be back!

Very comfortable bed, adequate storage for clothes, useful desk area.
We appreciated access to the washer and dryer in another unit.
Great space and location, super friendly hosts!

Location is ideal, skylights make for a lots of natural light and spacious feel. Bruce & Karen were responsive and kind. The beds are so comfortable with very nice linens.! Bathroom and shower are great. I saw a review that said small bathroom….totally disagree. Plenty of room to walkabout.
A beautiful space with great light, peaceful surroundings, wonderful support from our “Super Host.”
Easy to find and host is very accommodating.
Super cute and great location! Nice, clean, absolutely loved the space. Would definitely come back. Hosts communicated everything to us wonderfully and we loved our stay.
Excellent spot. Space was as described. Walking distance from many great bars and restaurants. Enjoyed our stay.
Another great stay. They were proactive to be sure we were warm enough during the cold weather.

Great place to stay when visiting Decatur and Atlanta. Short walk to downtown Decatur. Lovely neighborhood. Very comfortable space that was perfect for me and my two kids while visiting friends and family. I would definitely stay here again.

A very nice apartment walking distance (3-4 blocks) to town. Lots of restaurants nearby and we really enjoyed the Dekalb Farmers Market! My husband and I stayed 3 weeks which I guess was unusual. I think it is meant to accommodate guests for one week or so. There is no washer/dryer, ice maker, oven or dishwasher, but we adjusted and called it our “ tiny house”! We wanted to be near town and we were. Our kids are in Brookhaven ( the reason for the trip) and we were surprised that it took 30 minutes (7-8 miles) to get to their house. Traffic!!
Description was accurate. Well maintained. Great location.
What a perfect location. We walked everywhere and enjoyed our stay very much.

The location is great; walkable distance to Decatur Square. There is a very friendly, outdoor cat who greeted us every day. The bathroom is well appointed but very small and the bed is also small for two people. We had a great time, though!

This place is perfect if you’re coming to stay in Decatur. The location is amazing as it’s in walking distance to many great restaurants and shops. The bed was very comfortable and we slept soundly in the quiet neighborhood. The bathroom was spacious with a great shower. 5 stars. Everything was as pictured and even better than we expected. Definitely stay here if you want a relaxing, convenient, and comfortable place to call home while you’re in Decatur.
I would absolutely recommend staying here if you’ll be in the area. Bruce and Karen’s place was exactly as described, and had everything I needed.

This was a lovely place to stay while I was in Atlanta for work. The restaurant guide that Bruce and Karen made was a life saver! The unit is clean and cozy, and the location is great - a short walk to all the restaurants in downtown Decatur.

Bruce and Karen are great, warm hosts. They are communicative and welcoming, but give ample space to not feel intrusive. The location is perfect with an easy walk to downtown Decatur. The furnishings were nice, including a quite comfortable bed. And the amenities were a bonus with multiple kinds of coffee, creamer, etc available, a nice deck to enjoy the beautiful Fall weather, and Roku tv. A very comfortable place to stay in a perfect location!

Apt was great. Fantastic location to everything in Decatur. Was well stocked with the essentials. Skylights + big trees kind of made it feel like a tree house in the living room which was pretty great. The neighborhood cat that hung out on the porch was awesome and super friendly. Would definitely stay again!
Bruce and Karen truly are “Super Hosts!” They have a beautiful space and they make everything very easy and welcoming.
Bruce and Karen’s guest home was wonderful. Felt much like home and had all those small amenities that you wish other Airbnb’s had. The hosts are great communicators and we’d be happy to stay again!
clean well stocked nice and spacious apartment. great location. we enjoyed our stay.

Had a wonderful, relaxing time! The beds are super comfortable and the shower is very spacious. The whole place was over the garage so felt like we were staying in a treehouse. Loved the quiet of the deck too, great with coffee or a late night beer. Definitely will try to stay here again!
Great place! Easy to walk around to places

Excellent property and location. Super clean and lovely inside. I used the desk nook for my remote job while there, great lifting. Beautiful natural light coming in the main area as well. Superb communication and ease of check in. Thankful to stay here for our last minute need to be near Atlanta!

We enjoyed our time in Atlanta and had a comfortable stay at Bruce and Karen’s.
Great location and everything we needed was provided.
Very easy check in and out.
No complaints.
Excellent location, lovely place. Easy walk to downtown Decatur and MARTA. We’d love to stay here again.
great location but as others have noted allergens can be an issue! also the kitchen has no oven.

Bruce and Karen’s place is in a great location, easily walkable to shops and dining in Decatur. The bed and futon were very comfy and we really appreciated it when they let us check-in early. Highly recommend as a place to stay when visiting Atlanta.
Perfect location and so comfortable.
they were great host and their places is fantastic and it was located close to pretty much everywhere i went to go eat and drink. would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to stay in the area.

Great location, easy walking distance to downtown as well some several parks where we went for our kids to play. Also convenient location regarding public transportation, a friend living in Atlanta was able to visit us and walk from a station to our place.

Excellent location, host and house! We choose this location as it is very close to downtown and Marta, and the closeness to Marta allowed us to take public transportation to reach out to Airport when returned. Everything works as expected, and everything I read is exactly what I experienced during my stay. Bruce is such a nice person to meet and we enjoyed the meeting and conversation with him; he always responded immediately to my questions.
The house is in the quiet street and there is a long driveway to the end where you can easily park and turn around; of course you might not need a car as you can easily walk to Avondale station or you can drive and park the car there for 24 hours.
The rooms are very nice, looks even nicer than in the picture. I felt very relaxed when in the room especially in the hot day. We are happy with the stay so simply booked it again for Fall before we left :-).
Great location in a beautiful neighborhood.

This was a great quiet location close to MARTA. All the ammenities you need except for an oven. A/C works great. Quiet. Great owners/hosts. Very comfortable bed. Modern washroom. Nice office space. Internet not the greatest for Zoom, had to use my data. Not sure if thats normal.

We stayed here for a long weekend and loved the place. Location is great, near the center of Decatur but very quiet and with lovely green surroundings. The apartment has a very nice feel with the skylight in the living room as a nice bonus. Also enjoyed being able to sit outside and Bruce was super easy to communicate with. Can highly recommend - will definitely try to come back again.
Great location, great space, and great hosts. Will be booking again if we come back to the area.

Fantastic location - beautiful quiet neighborhood street! We barely used the car - easily walkable to downtown Decatur. The deck outside was beautiful and felt very private due to all the large trees around. The kitchen was decently stocked and they even had little creamers in the fridge for coffee. Loved the skylights in the main room - made it feel large and airy. Great place to stay if you want to explore Decatur!

This is a great place to stay! It's surrounded by trees in a quiet and safe neighborhood that's close to so many things! Bruce and Karen supplied all that we needed and then some, including a beautiful flower arrangement on the table when we arrived. The place is full of light that's filtered through beautiful greenery from surrounding trees. The place was clean and well-maintained and Bruce and Karen were great with communication. There were no problems and we definitely enjoyed our stay.

Everything was really organized and well prepared,
it is the perfect place to travel greater Atlanta area.
Thanks for such a great apartment!

We had a wonderful 2 night stay at this home! We ended up renting it for our wedding nights for after events nearby. It was exactly the peaceful, quiet, cozy, centrally-located escape we needed. Thank you Karen and Bruce!
Bruce and Karen's place is a great, pleasant, clean, and convenient stay. Excellent at communication, the stat is worth the value!
Great location, great hosts. Walking distance to Decatur Square with lots of amenities.

Bruce and Karen's property is located in a quaint section of Decatur and is a short walk to the downtown area with wonderful restaurants and walks.
They provide their guests with an awesome directory of local restaurants, which include their own personal reviews.
My wife and I found their facility very comfortable and clean.

Bruce and Karen's Private Garden Apartment is a beautiful Atlanta Airbnb. It's close to many places to eat and visit in Decatur, GA, and they are amicable and helpful hosts. We were in town for an event at the Fernbank Museum, and this was a perfect spot!
The windows and skylights brought the beauty of the outdoors inside. The lovely 2nd-story deck looked out over a beautiful backyard with a stunning tree. The neighbor's friendly cat also stops by to say hi. The kitchen had everything we needed for our meals, and the desk was good for getting work done in the evening. One minor thing to note is that if you are a bigger person like me, the bed might be slightly creaky.
We had a wonderful stay at their home. They made us feel very welcome, and we would recommend their place to anyone looking for a nice place to stay in Decatur! Excellent communication before arrival as well.

It is never, ever my intent to harm or cause any issues with their livelihood or stream of income, but it is always my intent to be honest in my reviews, especially if it affected my health. I want to see these hosts succeed – they were very kind and responsive during our stay and I wish them the best.
However, I unfortunately experienced getting sick at this home due to poor ventilation/mold. This review will stick out like a sore thumb in a sea of great reviews, and I struggled with writing it, but it was my personal experience.
Let me start with the good stuff.
We’re from Marietta, just north of Atlanta, and chose this spot for two nights to celebrate my husband’s birthday after seeing a show at the Tabernacle (about 15 minutes away). We always enjoy Decatur and were happy to see how close this was to the Square. The setting is lovely and warm. The deck overlooks a lush, private yard. It’s a great spot for coffee, reading, bird watching or having wine with friends before dinner. The birds and squirrels run around the yard and the neighborhood cat comes around for belly rubs and naps on the deck. So cute!
The layout of the space flows well. The skylight adds a nice touch to the living area, where we spent some time on the couch. The kitchen had the basics and we didn’t find ourselves missing anything. There’s a separate space to work and the bathroom was nicely updated.
The hosts were gracious and allowed us to have our friends, another couple, stop by for drinks and allowed them to also park in the back driveway. The four of us walked to dinner - the location is AMAZING. It was a 10-minute walk to the Square that takes you through the cutest streets with many homes to admire, especially during springtime in Atlanta. We felt safe and really enjoyed scoping out the area on foot.
However --
The space seemed clean upon entering but I immediately detected a mild musty odor. I was confused, because it’s repeatedly referred to as 'airy' in so many reviews, and I am sure that is what reviewers have experienced – I am not doubting anyone! Most people cannot detect these their sensitivity to bacteria/mold until they have experienced exposure over time. But I let it go and tried to be fair, until we moved through the space a bit more.
There were crumbs and a good bit of hair from a previous guest on the couch. The rugs need a good cleaning. The bed, while comfy and cozy, squeaked a lot, like every time we got in or moved in bed. There are questionable stains on the pillows which we didn’t realize until we stripped the bed when leaving. The toilet needed to be wiped down behind the lid.
There is a AC window unit in the bedroom that was dusty and not properly sealed. There was mold above the shower stall. There is no fan or ventilation system in the bathroom. There are large transom windows leading out into the hallway but no actual airflow directing the air out, so when it’s warm it just sits there.
We left a night early because by the afternoon of the second day my nose was running, I was coughing, my eyes were itchy and lethargic, and there was a slight wheeze in my chest. I carry an inhaler, but it doesn’t help with mold.
We emailed the hosts the next morning and explained why we had left, telling them they had all the makings for mold, especially the visual evidence of actual mold in the bathroom. This is dangerous stuff, not to be taken lightly, and I told him guests deserve a safe place. Both my husband and friend smelled musty odors, including in the bedroom.
The hosts explained that they employ a refugee with bad eyesight to clean. I appreciate that, but folks are paying their hard earned money for a clean space and also paying a cleaning fee. They also explained that the home was older and suggested I stay somewhere newer next time. It is older, sure, but that doesn’t mean it has to be unsafe. The age of a home should not affect someone’s health. He suggested it might have been my reaction to pollen. I live in Atlanta, I know what the pollen is like here, and I know how my body responds to pollen. Not this.
Lastly, the host assured me that he had 'bleached the mold in the bathroom'. I feel there is a deeper issue to inspect aside from some mold on the surface. They comped me $100 for leaving early, which I did not request, but was appreciated.
Some folks may not detect a thing or realize the effect it may have on them. It’s a great space and the location is fantastic, especially for a quick weekend, but I hope the hosts will take this issue seriously. They made it clear they have their Airbnb to help them stay in their home, and I respect that, but on the flip side, folks are paying their money to stay at these spaces too, and it’s not fair to not be accountable and make excuses if someone can actually get ill. Spending $400 for 2 nights to celebrate a birthday is a splurge for many people. Again, my intent is NOT to hurt anyone. I just wanted to be honest about MY experience. I wish Bruce and Karen the best.

Enjoyed our stay at this lovely Airbnb. The place was very clean and airy. It was so nice to sit on the deck and enjoy the sounds of nature. The streams of sun through the skylights added a sense of peace. Within walking distance to all downtown decatur has to offer. Would definitely recommend this place. 5 stars!
Great location...10 min walk to downtown Decatur. Bruce was very responsive. Apartment at back of house and nicely secluded. Great experience and would stay again.
A really comfortable, quiet place to stay!

Furnishings can use an upgrade. But that said, location, location, location, location. This airbnb it's about as convenient as you can get in the city of Atlanta and in Decatur. Near to restaurants and public transportation this place is perfect.

We had a great stay at Bruce and Karen’s. Great location within easy walking distance to downtown Decatur shops and restaurants, comfortable bed, good AC and heat as needed, friendly hosts. Highly recommend.
Perfect location for downtown Decatur. The location was very private and perfect for our stay.
Great spot, convenient and very comfortable . extra Futon bed was nice. Good bathroom setup. Parking easy

Everything was wonderful and just as listed. We enjoyed the back deck and skylight room. Many good options for eating and stocking up on groceries nearby. We stayed here to visit Stone Mountain, and it was the perfect location just a short drive away. Highly recommend!
This is our second time staying here and we continue to love it! It is a great location and beautiful place to stay!
Beautiful, comfortable place. enjoyed the neighborhood and nice walk to town. Karen and Bruce provide all that is needed.
Private and clean - in a perfect location to walk too many great spots. We highly recommend Bruce and Karen’s for your next trip to Decatur
Great location close to downtown Decatur. Checking in was a breeze and the accommodations were very nice. I’d highly recommend this place!
This apartment has everything we needed, was quiet, comfortable & in a good location. Hosts are very communicative. We will stay again when we are visiting family in the area.

The absolute perfect location if you’re planning to visit Decatur Square. We were in town for a show at Eddie’s Attic and felt very comfortable walking to and from the venue. Hosts are very quick to communicate, and we had everything we needed during our stay. Very sweet neighborhood cat greeted us each morning and evening. Quiet neighborhood and easy parking.
Bruce and Karen's space is beautiful and peaceful and has positive energy. The location is close to the Decatur square and very walkable. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay there.
Lovely space in a great location. Downtown Decatur is literally a few minutes walk away. Very responsive hosts.

Enjoyed staying in this cozy quiet guest home with Bruce and Karen. Great location, quiet safe neighborhood, and close proximity to Decaturs restaurants and pubs. I enjoyed being greeted each evening on my return by a sweet female calico. Great place and amenities. Steven Clark
Always wonderful to stay at Bruce and Karen’s- my go to place when I’m in Decatur/Atlanta.

Bruce and Karen have two units at this location. We booked both (we were five) and both units were immaculate and excellently located for our purposes (a birthday celebration for an Agnes Scott student): Just a short (< 10 minutes) walk to either the campus and the downtown restaurants. The apartment units themselves were clean, comfortable and well-appointed.
We should also mention that Bruce and Karen were always quick to respond to our messages, which we very much appreciate.

This apartment was exactly what we needed. A place where we could be comfortable and have a convenient location. The apartment is very well equipped, wifi works great and the temperature was perfect.
I'd defintely stay again!
Wonderful stay!
Loved the stay, great location. Perfect for closeness to Decatur Square!

This private apartment is so cozy! There is a nice deck for sipping coffee and reading or eating alfresco. Inside, the kitchen is equipped with all you need to whip up a meal and you can relax on the sofa or futon to watch tv under the skylights. The shower gets nice and hot and the water pressure is perfect. Communication with Bruce and Karen was easy-peasy. They provided contactless check in/out instructions that were super easy to follow. If you want to be able to walk to Decatur Square, this is the perfect location.
Great hosts! Very responsive and helpful!

Bruce and Karen were wonderful hosts and very accommodating. The AirBnB was great! We loved the deck and being able to walk to the main area of Decatur. Exactly what we were hoping for! We highly recommend it!
This property is in a great location. It is very clean and well furnished. This is the nicest Airbnb we have stayed in.

This place was the perfect place to stay for a weekend getaway--super comfortable and cozy, great amenities, and a convenient walking distance to a bunch of food places and cute shops in Decatur Square! Bruce and Karen are incredibly welcoming hosts with clear, timely communication!
As advertised, the hosts are friendly. Good location.
Excellent location! Walking distance to downtown Decatur. Adorable neighborhood cat that says hello.

The apartment is great as a base for visiting Decatur, and is walking distance to the center of town and to the Marta train line. The unit has a well designed kitchen, a spacious and airy living room, a comfortable bedroom, a small desk workspace, and a decent bathroom. There is plenty of on-street parking. And the Wi-Fi works well.
This is a beautiful space near downtown Decatur. Bruce and Karen are wonderful!

This well-appointed place is wonderfully clean, well-lit bucolic respite from a busy couple of days. Our whole visit went better knowing that we had such a peaceful, conveniently located (and well-appointed) place to return to.

Lovely and well-designed space very close to the city of Decatur. Bruce and Karen provided a very thorough list of local restaurants, with reviews. Comfortable with excellent natural light. Separate work space with lots of desk space. They have thought of everything: ironing board, wardrobe with hangers, hamper, shampoo and conditioner, lots of coffee and tea choices…

We flew in for a concert, stayed over two nights. Perfect location for getting to trains which stop 100m from the Mercedes Benz stadium - better than parking (probably takes as long to get out the parking lot after a show). The hosts have some really great teas and coffees available. Actual unit is as advertised, neat and tidy.

We stayed at Bruce and Karen's place for an extended weekend to checkout the aquarium. The location was great: an easy walk to a bunch of really good local restaurants as well as the Marta to get downtown. The place was clean and private, tucked away in a nice neighborhood. We would stay there again the next time we're in town!

Just as described, lovely place in a great location (truly walkable!) the cat visitor was extra sweet but more importantly the place is clean, spacious, and well appointed! Will stay again when in town!
Great central location, Bruce and Karen are very responsive and they home is comfortable and bright.
Nice place to get away.
Cozy garden apartment for a comfortable retreat.
Would definitely stay here again! It was perfect!
Can’t imagine a better place to stay in Decatur! And Bruce and Karen are wonderful hosts ✨✨

Great place to stay. Everything is in 10minutes walking distance from train station to supermarket. It is half hour to the downtown Atlanta, with quiet and elegant neighborhood and lovely backyard with a magnificent tree to enjoy a meal or a cup of coffee.

My wife and I love this spot. It is well equipped and spacious for the two of us. Clean, comfortable, spacious, and a great location. It is an easy walk to Decatur square. The little Kroger is also an easy walk. We really hope to stay here again the next time that we are in town.

If you want to be nestled among the trees, watch the stars when nightfall comes and be greeted by the cutest kitty upon your arrival; this is the place to stay. The deck is absolutely wonderful to fit snd have morning coffee. We would definitely stay here again! Great location, lovely accommodations!

Loved my stay here! Bright, spacious, beautiful garden-style apartment. Very clean. The location is absolutely perfect– Everything you need is within walking distance, restaurants, grocery, etc. would definitely stay here again.
Awesome location and great hosts! Will stay again next time I visit Atlanta
Gorgeous place and perfect location. I always love coming back here. Bruce and Karen are great.

Charming, clean and walking distant to downtown Decatur. We had everything we needed including Wi-Fi, hair drier and plenty of coat-hangers and linens. It was just what my sister and I needed for a week long family visit.
definitely very good choice! the neighborhood is nice! They use quality products. and they have taken the time to make good suggestions to get to know the place
Great location to walk downtown and to the square. Beautiful updated bathroom. Bruce and Karen are just a text away if you have any issue or question.

This is our second time staying in this apartment—we love the cozy comfortable space with lots of light and a friendly neighborhood cat (who stays outside and can be ignored if that’s not your thing). Location can’t be beat and the hosts provide an info binder chock full of recommendations so you can make the most of your Decatur stay.

Bruce and Karen's place is exceptional. Walking distance to several restaurants, stores, and two MARTA stations. The apartment is spacious and impeccably clean. Hosts are very responsive and accommodating. Can't say enough good things about this Airbnb!

Had a great stay at Bruce and Karen’s. The guest house was clean, inviting and cozy. My family of 4 enjoyed the comfy beds, roomy bathroom and well equipped kitchen. We were even able to cook a lovely dinner while there. It was nice having a dedicated work space as well, and my kids fell in love with the incredibly friendly neighborhood cat! The location in Decatur was perfect for exploring the charming town, and Atlanta area!

The place was bright and light and only three short blocks to Decatur restaurants . It was also nice having a kitchen with silverware, coffee cups, bottled water, coffee and lots of tea bags.
Thanks for hosting us, Bruce and Karen.
This well located listing is peaceful, tidy and private.
Very relaxing, peaceful atmosphere.

I had a great stay here. The space is clean, feels recently renovated, and wonderfully light, especially the main room that faces the back yard. Very quiet and peaceful, yet just a couple of blocks from the vibrant downtown Decatur restaurant scene. I would absolutely stay here again.
I have stayed here several times and it is quite lovely. Bruce and Karen are the iconic “super hosts!”

This is a great place to visit. Loved walking to town. Very comfortable and quiet in a wonderful neighborhood. We had everything we needed for a restful and enjoyable stay. The hosts were responsive and helpful.
It was everything as indicated. I’d definitely stay again.
The place was very comfortable and clean. Bruce and Karen make sure it has has everything you need. Highly recommend

Conveniently located, Private, Nice to sit on back deck overlooking backyard. Bed in bedroom was comfortable. About 7 miles to center of Atlanta. and coveinant to Stone Mountain, about half way from both locations.
Such a nice apartment. It was more spacious than I imagined. Perfect for a family of four. Super clean, nice shower, and gorgeous deck. Nice easy walk to Decatur square for amazing restaurants.
The experience was great! Very comfortable and clean with all the amenities. I highly recommend this bnb to all.

Beautiful apartment nestled in a charming house amidst lush trees. Excellent location with a short, easy walk to downtown Decatur. Bruce and Karen left a binder full of neighborhood tips and were very communicative!

Bruce and Karen's place in Decatur is wonderful. The location behind their main house is particularly nice as it is away from the street. The neighborhood is purely residential (and upscale) but near enough to markets and restaurants to be very convenient. I can't think of anything that would disqualify it from being the nicest place in Atlanta.
Clean, comfortable spot. Good location with easy walk to shops/restaurants. Hosts communicated well. Super comfy bed!
Bruce and Karen's place is great. Comfortable space and an easy walk to restaurants, bars, and groceries. Bruce and Karen were very responsive and helpful also.

Serene oasis!!! Space is super comfortable and ideally situated in Decatur! Close to train, shops, great restaurants and pubs. Best part for me is that I am a tree/nature lover and this outdoor deck space was so special--lovely place for morning nature meditation! I saw about 15 bird species the first day we were there. Hosts are so accommodating, responsive and incredibly kind. They are there if you need them, but have everything set up perfectly so you are completely independent. Can't say enough great things about Bruce and Karen!
Such a beautiful space. Feels like home away from home!
Spacious, sunny space. Extremely clean and comfortable, plus a great location. Bruce and Karen really paid attention to detail.
Beautiful space. Karen and Bruce are great hosts. You’ll want to come back!

We had a great stay with Bruce and Karen. The listing is right in the heart of Decatur. It is so close to the little Krogers that I was able to walk over for groceries. It is stylishly decorated and had everything that we needed. We would definitely stay again.

Bruce and Karen’s place was exactly as pictured. We even got to meet them on our first day. Very sweet couple. The house is clean, has everything you need and is in a great location to explore Decatur and/or get into the city. Would absolutely stay again.

We had great experience, from the beautiful, bright, spacious space to take responses to our questions. everything is as described, and very clean, updated and comfortable. The location is perfect. I'm sure we'll be back!

This placed was perfect for a little weekend retreat/staycation. I wanted a quiet private place to get some extra work done for my business, and this apartment was just right! Love all the natural light coming in, and the back yard is lovely as the view from the deck. Super cute place and a wonderful stay!
Bruce came to say hello and check on me once when I was out on the deck, which was nice! Otherwise it was very private and quiet.
Bruce and Karen's place is a great little spot. Walking easily to Decatur square and in the neighborhood is delightful. We loved the patio overlooking the backyard.

A perfect retreat for a week when I needed quiet time away from my own home. Great natural light, pretty yard and deck. Kitchen is comfortable to cook in and the restaurants of Decatur Square a few minutes walk away.

Bruce and Karen's place was spectacular. It was a nice faraway from home. Easy walking distance to the town square. We were greeted by Bruce. The suite was spacious and well lit. Everything you need in a home. We will definitely stay again in Decateur.
A great stay in an amazing location! The hosts were very hospitable and easy to communicate with and we had an amazing time!
It’s clear why Bruce and Karen are “Super Hosts”. They have a beautiful space and they are helpful and attentive. Location is a short walk to downtown Decatur. Definitely worth checking out.
The place was very clean and comfortable. I appreciated the good towels and wash clothes and the bed was very comfortable. I really enjoyed the deck
Great Place! Great location! Absolutely too cute!!
Clean, spacious, and walking distance to Decatur Square. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Bruce and Karen's place and would not heistate to book again if we are in the area.
Bruce and Karen's place was exactly as expected. A great little apartment very close to the action. Clean space and great communication.
This is a lovely space, and the location can't be beat! Bruce and Karen have created a lovely getaway. Cozy but with everything you might need.

Great place - Bruce and Karen’s guest suite was within a short walking distance to great restaurants within downtown Decatur. It was very clean when we arrived and worked well for both myself and my partner to work from home all week. Though the place is close to the train tracks, we rarely heard it and overall, it was very quiet stay. Hosts communicated quickly via the Airbnb app and were very friendly in our brief meeting! Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to stay in Decatur!
I loved the deck which had a great view of the back yard. Beautiful location in Decatur and very close to shops and restaurants.
A beautiful place to stay and within walking distance to tons of things. The place was very clean and the owners were great with communication! We will definitely stay again!
By far the best experience I’ve ever had. I will be returning and renting from them again.
A private apartment behind their home. Lovely space with all the necessities. Close walk to downtown decatur. Our stay was wonderful, thanks!

Bruce and Karen were amazing communicators. They responded to inquiries within minutes every time. The check in was quick and easy. The local tips provided were very helpful and we used them extensively. It was clean and the shower was pretty great. The location was incredible with it being minutes away from right where you want to be in Decatur. We walked the few minutes into town multiple times.

Stayed for a week to quarantine.
Safe and walkable location. Nice back deck to hang out and eat. Internet was solid. Good lighting. Bathroom was nice. Karen and Bruce were good hosts.
I think a train goes under the house or on the other side of the house in back. It's very loud and confusing the first couple of times and then you don't notice it.
This bright space is very close to the downtown square. The pictures are accurate and the owners are friendly. Perfect for our needs.

Very good place for a couple of day getaway and the goats make it even more homely. The outside could use a little TLC but all in all it is a great place and would not hesitate to stay again in the future
One of my favorite airbnb I’ve stayed at. Spotless and so peaceful. Would definitely come back!
A cozy retreat in the middle of the city. We enjoyed the porch and watching the goats frolic. Super comfy bed. Highly recommend.
Such a peaceful getaway with all the amenities. The Nest was the perfect base from which to explore Atlanta. We will be back!
We enjoyed staying at The Nest! We loved the goats and enjoyed sitting on the porch overlooking the peaceful property. It was quiet and adorable! Thank you! We also appreciated the snacks :)

I can only agree with the positive reviews.
This must have already been written by predecessors: but the amenities correspond to a 5-star plus hotel. And it's as wonderful as it is on the countryside.
