This was the perfect spot to take in Atlanta—right in the middle of everything you will want to do and see, but incredibly peaceful. The goats were too fun! We appreciated the proactive communication, and quality furnishings. This has to be the most comfy bed I’ve experienced in an Airbnb.
Great place to stay! Beautiful, comfortable, and peaceful … plus goats!! They were so cute and funny! Highly recommend!

Wonderful long weekend stay. Just as described, clean, quiet, peaceful, really nice neighborhood. This was exactly what we were looking for in a relaxing getaway. Really enjoyed the easy walk to the Atlanta Zoo. Short drive to so many restaurants. Loved the basket of snacks and treats waiting for us when we got there (and excellent coffee!). And, of course, the goats. They are so personable and so much fun to just watch while they're happily playing and eating grass right outside our place. We enjoyed visiting with the 3 goats, I miss them already! That's truly what makes this place one of a kind. Highly recommended to anyone looking for a stay in ATL still close to everything you want to do, but staying outside the noise and traffic of the city.

My husband and I planned a weekend away to reconnect and this place was exactly what we needed. The property is truly amazing and a hidden gem in a big city. You feel almost as if you have stepped onto a farm in the middle of an established neighborhood. I always look for a place that is unique and special and this was that property. I will admit one of the biggest draws was that there were goats on the property and well, who doesn't love goats?! Bruno in particular was mischievous and bonded with my husband. I haven't laughed so hard in a long time! Directions on where to park and how to enter the "Nest" were simple and clear. The property had everything you would need and more. Extremely clean, quaint and wonderful. We loved sitting on the porch with a glass of wine while we played cards and watched the goats. So relaxing! Great restaurants nearby & close to the city for excursions. Would absolutely recommend and look forward to staying again. Loved every minute!

Wow this was a very exciting experience! The guest house is nice and secluded in the back and overlooks the goat farm. The goats were so sweet and it was really nice view to overlook in the morning. It was the perfect amount of space with cozy lighting. The bed and comforter were very comfortable. I loved the area of Grant Park nice and walkable. There were some bugs but it didn’t bother us too much. Enjoyable experience!
Sara was extremely helpful and very accommodating, and the place was beautiful. Loved every minute of it. Definitely stay here!
This was our second stay at The Nest. It’s so comfortable and has everything you need. If and when we return to Atlanta this will be our first choice.

The neighborhood was really nice and very accessible to downtown. The space was incredibly clean and comfortable. Goats were so cute!! Hosts were super nice and easy to get in touch with. Will definitely stay again if I am in the area.

The goats steal the show but this little cottage would be 5/5 even without them. It’s nicely appointed, super clean, private, and the location is great. Also they offer the most consumables / amenities I’ve ever seen? Chocolates, popcorn, granola bars, coffee, toiletries, you name it - it’s in there.
Loved our stay, would visit again!

A lovely nest near downtown, we loved staying here and we're so comfortable for a weekend stay in Atlanta. The place was so cute, exactly as described and super comfortable for a weekend for two. We loved being able to walk to a local breakfast place and the zoo being so close. We also loved the cute neighbors (the three goats in the pen) and nice amenities inside the stay. Will definitely stay again in the future, absolutely loved it!

Our stay was incredible. The instructions from getting there to checking out were so clear and easy, I didn't have to worry about anything. The place was clean, quiet, beautiful, peaceful, you name it. And the goats were amazing hosts! 🐐 I loved that they came right up to greet us every time we passed. This place will be my top choice every time I come to Atlanta.
A beautiful home and amenities!

This was arguably the best Airbnb experience I have ever had.
The small details did not go unnoticed; the hosts curated the perfect environment for a relaxing two night stay. The goats were the cherry on top of an already perfect setting. My colleagues at my conference were extremely jealous that my Airbnb had goats and theirs did not.
I wish I could rate this stay with 1,000 stars. I miss those goats already!
The perfect getaway for us animal lovers. Bruno the goat witnessed our engagement! Walking distance from the zoo, and Sarah let us check out late since our flight was in the evening.

The Nest was honestly delightful. We enjoyed the coziness of the cottage which had so many thoughtful amenities (plus, the bed was SO comfortable) . We enjoyed sipping our coffee on the porch that overlooked the goats’ pasture - Watching them play and listening to their sweet sounds . And the little goats were so so friendly! We loved getting to visit with them! Would love to stay here again

Our stay at the Fig and Goat was everything we could have asked for. Cozy and warm in a lovely setting, with adorable goats as a bonus. Best amenities of any Air B&b we’ve stayed. Great neighborhood, close to Zoo Atlanta and Grant Park.
great area, cute place, little goats!!

We loved our stay and very much loved seeing the goats every day ! The place was clean and very comfortable. It was in a great location. We would love to stay again the next time we are in Atlanta. I would highly recommend Sara’s place.
The Nest at Fig & Goats was beautifully appointed, and there were thoughtful touches everywhere! A great retreat space, and very comfortable for both of us. I would certainly stay here again.

Lovely place! Great location in Grant Park, it was a little urban oasis. The goats were so cute and an extra fun perk! The property had extra amenities like snacks and toiletries. We had a great stay and wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again!
Absolutely lovely! Everything about this place is as described and more. From the cozy bed to the thoughtful snacks, and of course the goats - this is a fabulous place to stay. We will be back!

My husband and I were in Atlanta visiting family and friends for a long weekend. We really enjoyed our stay at The Nest @ the Fig & Goat Retreat. The home had everything we needed to rest and relax. Sara the host and Mila the co-host were extremely responsive from the moment I booked our stay. We would definitely stay with them again.
It is always a pleasure to stay at Sara's beautiful place!

We could not have been happier with our first Air BnB experience. We celebrated our 25th anniversary at the Nest. Such a comfortable and clean place to stay! We couldn’t believe how close we were to the GA Aquarium, Stone Mountain and the zoo. We actually moved our plans around to spend our last day just being cozy and petting the adorable goats since it rained hard all day. Loved having a hot water tea pot and lots of snacks! I enjoyed doing a morning meditation sitting on the deck listening to the birds and nature all around. Shocked we were so close to Atlanta! I would say to plan for food. There isn’t much to walk to except a little deli which was great! We plan on returning! We cant say enough about this little gem. Perfect hosts and a bed that you won’t want to get out of!! Thank you for making our anniversary special. 🩷

Our stay at the Nest was wonderful! Everything was clean and cozy. The goats were so much fun! Of all the Airbnbs we have stayed at, this one by far had the most stocked items in case you needed anything. They thought of EVERYTHING. The bed was exceptionally comfortable. We would definitely come back!

It was so relaxing and peaceful. I really enjoyed playing with the goats. It was hands-down, one of the best Airbnb experiences I have ever had! Amazing hospitality and attention to detail. As someone who was born and raised in Atlanta I’m here to tell you that this is a great location to stay, and have access to so many things Anytime I’m visiting my family in Atlanta I will be checking for their availability. Thank you!

I stayed for the weekend for a concert in town for my girlfriends birthday, and all I can say is coming back to this airbnb felt like a breath of fresh air after being out and about in Atlanta. It was very quiet and in a safe area. When we first arrived I was exhausted and hungry after driving, and the little snack basket was a super thoughtful touch. There was a sweet little handwritten note and rules laid out clearly for when you first get there. They had a bunch of little goodies incase you ended up forgetting anything. The bed was also super comfortable, it was really easy to fall asleep and stay asleep. :) and last but not least, the goats. I loved them all, but probably Bruno most of all. He was super sweet and he really liked trying to eat my sweater lol. Anyways, I will definitely be booking again if I stay in Atlanta! It’s a very nice little place to be. :3
We rented Sara's place for my in-laws, and it was the perfect spot for them. They loved watching the goats from their deck, and the location was so convenient for us. 10 out of 10!
the goats were adorable , the place was very comfy, a lot of cool small business around, got food at juniors pizza and it was very good, close to campus, close to downtown, awesome

This rental was very nice. It was very clean and secluded. Sara was always very responsive and seemed to be very caring of her guests. My girlfriend and I really enjoyed being on the property with the goats. We are both animal people and love anything that includes animals. I really enjoyed the personalized handwritten note she left for me as our check-in date was my birthday. That says tons about the host! We would definitely stay at this place again if we are ever back in Atlanta!

We absolutely LOVED our stay at the Nest. it's tucked away in a quite neighborhood and just a fee minutes from everything atlanta has to offer. everything was clean and well-stocked, and there was clearly a lot of thought put into the stay/experience. we'll definitely be back! and you can't bea haveling cute little goats to greet you every time you pull up!

Our stay at the Fig & Goat Nest was a perfect for our weekend stay in Atlanta. The property was very convenient to get anywhere within the city all while feeling like we were in our own private oasis. The space was super comfortable and had everything we may have needed. The goats were such a fun touch and made the experience just a little extra special!

We fell so in love with the Nest @ the Fig & Goat Retreat that it was hard to leave and even brought a tear to my eye. There’s so many wonderful things I can say about the property but the four goats topped it off for us. Every morning we’d look out the window to see if they were up. They were so friendly and Bruno especially stole our heart. The property was beautiful and made us feel right at home. Sara and David go above and beyond to have anything you could possibly need - toiletries, snacks, you name it they had it. The home is a short walk to the zoo and this lovely breakfast spot named HowdyATL. We felt comfortable and safe walking around the area. Everything on our to-do list was a close drive, including the aquarium. Anytime we return to Georgia we will book here with no hesitation!

We had a wonderful stay at the Nest!
Would highly recommend this spot & Sara as a host! Hoping to be back in the future!

Sara and Dave have thought of everything . It was an amazing few days just relaxing watching goats and sipping wine. We were in town for some concerts and couldn't have stayed anywhere better. I would stay here again and again, the goats are wonderful !!! Thanks yall for a great stay.

Such a wonderful place to stay for a work trip in busy Atlanta. After my appointments, I worked from the deck on my laptop. Great wifi coverage and speed, and the goats were definitely a change of pace. Friendly hosts, and they thought of everything to make guests feel comfortable in the space.

Absolutely loved the location, and if I had to pick one Sonny is my favorite goat. He would come hang out under the porch and smile while I talked to him. Very quiet and peaceful place to hang out in between trips to midtown music festival. Lots of rain over the weekend but we were still able to hang out under the covered porch with a ceiling fan to keep the mosquitos away. Sara was extremely responsive to texts, even left supplies that we wished we had brought! Basically thought of worst possible situation and saved us a trip to the store. We were able to get downtown in 15 minutes on Saturday night, and 18 minutes to midtown music festival at Piedmont Park. If I was going anywhere within 30 minutes Atlanta I would look to stay there again. Place was immaculate when we got there, shower was spacious, fridge was a little small, but with so many amazing places to eat who cares. Easy access to all sorts of good food! Ria Bluebirds for breakfast, 4-5 minutes, and a must enjoy!

The Nest was perfect in every way. We had a little trouble finding it in the dark. We didn’t arrive until mid nite. Our sweet Uber driver would not leave us until he was sure he took us to the right place.
The place was stocked with everything you needed and then some.
Sara was easy to contact, responded within minutes.
The highlight was the four goats in our front yard. If I ever go back that is where I will stay.
Thank you Sara.

This was a great Airbnb experience for us. Location was convenient. Close to many great restaurants. Nice to be close to Grant Park. The space was comfortable and well appointed. The friendly goats and coffee on the porch were a bonus.

This place was awesome!! I’ve been to Atlanta before, but I was on tour so I never really got to spend time outside a theatre. So when I booked a place to stay I was kind of guessing on neighborhood. Turns out, this is the cutest neighborhood in all of ATL in my opinion! Right by Grant Park and tons of restaurants and all that. Everyone clearly treats their homes with love here.
Our little place was great. Extremely clean, has all the little extras you may be looking for, lots of hot water in the shower, VERY comfortable bed, great AC.
But what sold me upon first booking was the goats. My husband and I are animal lovers and often foster stray anythings. And here, in the middle of Atlanta, you have a beautiful pasture with 4 super friendly goats. They’re the best. Bruno took a shine to my husband.
I recommend this spot to anyone. You won’t regret it :)
Had a great stay!

My stay was PERFECT!
I loved sitting on the deck watching the goats, listening to all the wild life and the beautiful grounds! Inside, it couldn’t get any nicer or cozier! The king bed was super comfy! The bathroom was so spacious! Like it said, perfect!! Can’t wait to stay here again!

The Nest is comfy and cozy! It is quiet and private, and has a great location. The place was clean, cute and looked just like the listing pictures. Extra thumbs up for super soft and comfortable bedding! We had a great stay and look forward to choosing the Nest the next time we visit Atlanta. :)

The Nest was totallywonderful. Our stay was very enjoyable and the hosts were very responsive to any question or request. The setting was so private and serene. We loved having our morning coffee on the porch watching the goats. Speaking of which, my wife was thrilled to have the little ones to visit and pet.
We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a quick stay.

absolutely fantastic airbnb. easily one of our very favorite stays out of all our travels. 10/10 would recommend as it was cozy, clean, and close to all of the things we wanted to do in atlanta. plus, my husband loved the goats!
I loved Sarah’s adorable farm-like stay in the city. Everything was perfect and the bed was heavenly. Attention to detail was outstanding. Thanks for a great stay!
We loved our stay at The Nest @ Fig & Goat Retreat! It was very clean, cozy, and perfect for a weekend stay. My husband loved the goats!

Such a cute and cozy oasis in the Atlanta area. The hosts truly thought of everything to ensure that I felt welcome and comfortable. The neighborhood was quiet and conveniently located, and the hosts provided clear instructions on how to access the guesthouse. The handwritten note and "just in case" snacks/toiletries were a nice touch. A true 5-star experience-- highly recommend.
We had a wonderful stay at this quiet and peaceful retreat. We loved interacting with the goats!
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The bed is heavenly and the goats are a perfect touch! I’d definitely recommend booking to friends.
Had the best stay in Atlanta. Goats were a great bonus!

We had a wonderful stay! The cottage was adorable and clean! They had everything we needed if we forgot anything. It felt very private even being in the city. The neighborhood is adorable and we loved our time with the goats :)
We enjoyed our stay. Thank you!
The fig & goat is a hidden gem in grant park. Quiet, private and peaceful but minutes away from all the action.

Stayed two days in Atlanta last month at "chic" hotel; stayed two days this week at the fig & goat retreat at less than half the cost and 10 times the experience - wonderful peaceful setting, amazing attention to detail, cute goats. Great place!

A nice cosy place with everything you need. A quiet location not far from the park and the zoo. We enjoyed the Sunday morning market in Grant Park and also the company of the cute goats. Thanks for a nice stay!
Thank you for your hospitality. We loved your place.
I’ve been staying at Sarah and David’s guest cottage since January. Every time I visit it’s such a pleasurable experience. It’s become a home away from home for me. I look forward to my next visit!

We had a wonderful stay at the Nest. I would have loved to stay there longer each day but we had places to go and people to see! The goats were so cute and loved to be petted. Our daughter and her family, whom we were visiting, lived very close. None of us could believe what a beautiful and spacious property it is, just tucked into such an urban location.
My husband and son had a great time. It was a pretty property and my son loved the goats. This was way better than a hotel.

Beautiful Airbnb with all the toiletries you could need and some lovely snacks also. The goats are so friendly and cute! Beautiful property. And definitely one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay

Sara is an amazing host and Mila also helped to ensure our check-in and amenities were easy/easy to find. The place is absolutely beautiful and peaceful and I can’t tell you how much fun and joy the goats brought us. It is the perfect escape but it’s perfectly located in the heart of the city near Grant Park. Truly one of my best Airbnb stays since I’ve had an account. I’ll be back!

Saras place stands out for being a restored, historic property - a rarity in Atlanta & Grant Park! While I was there alone & for business/ the cottage is likely best for a couple who wants seclusion & a romantic setting. So many details were thought of and they really have clearly tried to make everyone as comfortable as possible ( beautiful linens!)
Very close to the zoo & coffee shops while set back and private. The goats are adorable! There is a little up slope walking up to the cottage so likely not good for anyone with mobility issues. There actually two AirBnbs on the property with the larger one above the garage. There was a small issue with the original cottage that was out of the host’s control; they were VERY responsive and immediately came to address the issue- decided they needed professionals and moved me to the other apartment which was so beautiful! To me- AirBnB is about hosts that care and do everything in their power to make their guests comfortable! Sara does that!

The hosts were wonderful! They were so quick to respond to any questions I had from months prior to my check-in until the last day of our stay. Awesome location, well stocked, cute and cozy aesthetics, and friendly goats and welcoming hosts! We couldn’t have asked for anything more. Thank you for the warm hospitality!
Another perfect stay! Thank you!

I loved this little retreat in the middle of the city. Such an amazing property with the loveliest little goat friends that we quickly became attached to. We can’t wait to rebook when we visit ATL again. Thank you so much!
LOVED THIS PLACE!!!! Don’t hesitate to book it! The goats are awesome! The place is awesome! Highly recommended and will be back!

Had the absolute best time staying at the Nest!! The cottage itself was so comfortable and cozy. It had everything we needed and more. Really appreciated the conveniences like water bottles and outlets on each night stand. Sara was extremely responsive and was able to generously accommodate a late checkout given our flight timing. The best part was the goats for sure!! It was so exciting to return from our adventures and be greeted by these 4 adorable little guys. Will be returning next time we are in Atlanta for sure!!
Another amazing stay. I can’t wait to get back!!!!!

It’s hard to write a review about the actual place we stayed in when all we really wanted to do was cuddle with the goats! However, the cottage was very clean and cozy, and had everything we needed for our three day stay. It’s not as close to the beltline as we would’ve liked, but was hardly a problem. The last day we were there we walked through Grant Park over to Memorial Dr, a mile and half away to have breakfast. It was a top-notch weekend. Thank you very much.
We had an excellent second stay! Clean and comfortable as usual. Thanks agains Sara and David!
Place was very peaceful and just what we needed for our quick trip to Atlanta.

Again… The Nest is a haven inside a busy city. The goats. The beautiful home. It always establishes a deep sigh of relief as I roll up the driveway. The notes Sarah and David leave are a beautiful reminder that I’m at my home away from home. Thank you for the amazing space to come back to every night. It’s unbelievable. And did I mention the well mannered goats you get to hug and cuddle?

If I could give it 6 stars I would! This little place was perfect for coming into town for a couple of days for a concert at the State Farm Arena. The house was very comfortable and in a quiet neighborhood. It was within easy distance of the zoo, aquarium, and concert venue, but didnt feel like being in the city at all. I was really impressed with the extra touches of snacks and everything needed for coffee and tea available. We had so much fun playing with the goats, which was a cool bonus for animal lovers missing their pups. The next time John Mayer is in town, we will definitely be back!
Another amazing stay. Looking forward to the next months booked stays at The Nest!
Great location for us. Private and secure. Hosts were always available with answers and requests!
Loved this place so much. We fell in love with the property and the goats.
The place was so lovely. I love hanging with the goats and sitting on the porch. The bed is so comfortable and the hosts were so responsive. Perfect stay.

I can’t put into words how amazing our stay was. My husband and I are relocating and decided to stay at The Nest while house hunting and we had a very pleasant experience from start to finish. The bed was SO comfortable, like sleeping on a cloud. The Nest was very clean and we appreciated the snacks, coffee/tea and having emergency toiletries. Excellent location, beautiful spot right in the middle of the city. Easy check in and clear instructions. And of course I ADORED the goats. I ended up sitting outside with them for a while and they literally lay in your lap. Such sweet babies! Thank you so much Sarah and David. We loved our stay and hope to stay again one day!

I had a lovely stay!! The place and surroundings were so beautiful and peaceful. I could not believe all the thoughtful extras that were provided. I have never seen that in any of the air bbs I’ve stayed in. Coffee, tea, snacks, toiletries..lots of thoughtful touches. The goats were precious and it made my day coming home to them. When my work trip was cut short unexpectedly, Sara kindly refunded the last night on little notice. She is clearly a kind and gracious host. Thanks so much for letting me stay at your property

I can confidently say this was my favorite airbnb experience to date! Sara was extremely friendly, gave incredible recommendations, and made sure we were confident navigating the area. The house itself was spotless and extremely comfortable.
And THE GOATS!!!! They were so precious and sweet I wanted to hang out with them all day!! We had a stellar time.
Thank you Sara you rock!!
My husband and I visited Atlanta and absolutely loved Sara’s place! So charming, clean and cozy. Great communication with Sara and very quick responses. I totally recommend this little gem!

This was my second stay at Sarah and David’s The Nest. I was up at dawn and meandered into the barn yard to hang with goats. I still can’t believe I was in the middle of Atlanta. So peaceful. The guest house is the perfect respite to come home to after a days work. Comfortable. Thoughtful. And beautiful. I’ll be staying again the next time I’m in Atlanta.

The Nest is perfect for a quick weekend away. The location was EVERYTHING. Set in a quiet neighborhood, close to restaurants and social spaces. Our weekend was rained out, so we embraced the cozy cabin-like feel, sat on the covered porch with a book and a glass of wine and enjoyed the calming rain. We nodded off mid-day to the sound of rain on the roof, in what is probably the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in.
This Airbnb is clean and well kept. The amenities and essentials provided are perfect for any stay, they offer it all, down to snacks, coffee/teas, sunscreen, and hairspray. It really made the space feel like a home.
Playing with the goats was icing on the cake! They're so inquisitive, friendly, and happy to have you run around and play with them. Overall our stay here was highly enjoyable and I recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy getaway.

Amazing! What a beautiful setting in the middle of Atlanta. Quiet. Clean. Loved the goats right outside the door. Such a great spot to come home to after a long day in Atlanta. Sarah and her husband were thoughtful in communications and offer a perfect home base near great restaurants and beautiful Grant Park. I’ve already booked more time there and looking forward to returning.

If you’re traveling to Atlanta and you’re looking for the PERFECT place to stay, book The Nest with Sara. The nest is perfect for a quick weekend getaway trip and Sara will do whatever it takes to ensure that you are all set for your stay. The nest was very comfortable, clean, peaceful and Sara and David were great hosts. The location was perfect as well! I will always book with Sara when traveling to Atlanta!
The Nest is beautiful, comfortable, and clean. Sara is an excellent host—available and communicative. Would definitely recommend this place to others.

This place is absolutely amazing! The area was quiet and was exactly what I needed to relax, if you like baby goats this is definitely the place for you. The bed is probably the most comfortable thing I have ever slept on, definitely didn't disappoint. The location is close enough the major city and far enough to not deal with any of the loud city noises.

My husband and I came to Atlanta for a show and couldn’t pass up the possibility of waking up in this adorable spot. How such a peaceful little oasis can exist so close to the amenities of a big city is beyond me - but that’s what makes it so magical! The hosts were incredibly friendly and responsive, and instructions were clear and easy to follow (even in the dark)! We had the best time petting the goats and watching them play from our porch. Location is so convenient, safe, and relaxing. This is the perfect weekend stay for a couple and we’d love to return!
Beautiful accommodations with everything you needed and the most comfortable bed! The goats were so much fun to see and the hosts were absolutely wonderful! We will definitely stay here again!

Don’t look any further. Literally. Book right now. My husband & I came for a weekend getaway. The coziest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. So charming and had everything you needed. I wanted to take the bed home with me it was so cozy! If we come to ATL again we already decided this is where we would stay!
Great place to stay! Very clean, quaint, and comfortable! I would highly recommend!
What a charming space! The perfect location in Grant Park and easy check-in and check-out. All around an excellent stay!

The Nest @ Fig & Goat is an experience I will never forget. The host were responsive, helpful, nice and accommodating. The nest itself was cozy and felt like country side get away located in the city! I got engaged during my stay and the warm environment that the nest and the goats themselves offered set the tone. I will definitely be back someday!

Thanks, Sara, for a wonderful visit! I couldn't have been more comfortable!
We hope to be back.
Karen
We had a great time at the nest. It was a calm, quiet setting in the middle of busy Atlanta. Really cosy and comfortable. The goats were so sweet.
Enjoyed every minute of our stay! Great place! Great hosts!

This place was very nice and right in the heart of the area that we had our plans. It was convenient to lots of entertainment and good restaurants. Just know that for most restaurants you should make a reservation as there are lines to get in. The cottage was very clean and cozy, and I would definitely stay there again. It felt like you were in a secluded countryside but still in the heart of the city.
Sara's was everything we thought it would be and more...love love love.

My wife and I had a perfect stay at the Nest! We loved being greeted by the goats every time we walked up to the Nest! The place is very cozy and all we needed for our long weekend in Atlanta. We thoroughly enjoyed exploring the neighborhood and walking to some great breweries and restaurants. The bed is super comfortable and there was plenty of coffee stocked which we appreciated. I would not hesitate to stay here again when in the area!

Great location. Quiet neighborhood and beautiful property. Wonderfully comfortable bed. AirBnB is well stocked with complimentary supplies. Security by “guard goats.”😂 Sara and David are great hosts. This will be my go-to accommodation for Atlanta.

The Nest is a great place. Wonderful spacious grounds with the goats. Very lovely cozy accommodations. I wish we had had time to sit on the spacious deck under the oak tree overlooking the goat pen. You would not suspect that you are in the city of Atlanta !!
We really enjoyed our stay at the nest. It was a home away from home. Will definitely recommend to family and friend and stay again.
Relaxing, roomy, enojoyable, good location

I had a wonderful stay in this adorable cottage, set in a peaceful and idyllic setting, right in the middle of the city. The big porch overlooks a pasture that's home to some sweet little goats. The hosts are prompt and helpful and even have good snacks ready for you. One thing to note is that the place is tiny -- you walk into a galley kitchen and the bedroom is on your left and bathroom on your right. No living room or other spaces (other than the porch). But the bed is big and comfy and the property was perfect for my staycation.

My husband and I loved staying at this guest house in Atlanta. It was quiet, the goats were adorable, and the house had all the amenities one could possibly need for a short stay. We would definitely stay here again. :)
awesome location, clean, comfortable and what an amazing little farm they have. The goats were super cute and I would definitely stay her again!!
Sara and John’s Airbnb is absolutely delightful. It is located on the most serene beautiful property. The bed was one of the most comfortable one I have ever slept in!! A+++

A wonderful gem of a place.
We took uber everywhere and it was very reasonable.
The zoo nearby is one of the best I have seen and the animals are well cared for. Easy walk to the zoo.
If you like birds, this is the place to sit and listen to a variety of birds and watch goats!
Thank you David and Sara!!

Sara is a wonderful host. Her and her husband provide everything you could need for a quiet and restful getaway. The bed is the most comfortable I’ve ever been in. Of course the goats are so precious. So nice to sit on the porch and watch them graze. The decorations are perfect as well. We will definitely be back.

We loved our stay at the Nest! Great location, super quiet, and the goats on the property are adorable. It is an oasis in the city! The cottage was clean and had everything we needed for a short stay in town.
Thank you for the awesome stay!
Sara’s house was the perfect, beautiful little location in downtown Atlanta. It had all the amenities and it was so peaceful to stay there. We will definitely be back!

We absolutely enjoyed our stay at the retreat. It's central and close to the city yet secluded and quiet. It's romantic and with a rural charme yet comfortable and very well equipped. If you don't mind getting greeted by the cutest goats everytime you come back to the spot go and spend some time there ;-) Beyond that, Sara and David are extremely caring hosts, from any aspect imaginable they put a lot of effort into making our stay a wonderful one and ensured we feel welcomed and "at home on the road". Thanks a ton!!
One of the best places I've ever stayed and definitely had themost comfortablebed I've ever slept in!! We'll definitely be back!

This is an amazing place. Exactly as described. Clean, comfortable in a cute neighborhood. Close to many great places to visit. You don’t realize you are in a neighborhood because of the grounds, landscaping and cute goats! The bed, linens and chairs are comfortable. The extra touches are perfect. Dishes, utensils, Mini fridge, microwave, Krueger and sink are all you need. You won’t be sorry! We will definitely return.

The Nest at the Fig and Goat is a lovely oasis in the city. Such a calm and beautiful place to come home to after a busy day. The nest is beautifully appointed, the bed super comfy, the kitchenette equipped with snacks, tea and coffee (a Keurig and a great electric tea kettle). Communication was easy, and the goats super cute. Highly recommend the Nest!

The Nest exceeded our expectations. It was clean, very comfortable and in a very convenient location. Very comfortable mattress. Excellent water pressure. The neighborhood was friendly, well lit after dark and a perfect place for our daily walks. The little extras were so unexpected! High end snacks, coffee, tea and original Coca Cola! Every toiletry I might have forgotten! I especially appreciated the privacy and green space in the middle of the city! The goats made me happy! We are expecting our first grandchild in the fall and will absolutely be back!

Fantastic spot to stay while exploring Atlanta for a few days! Sara is an excellent host - fantastic communication and the Nest is absolutely lovely! A little piece of calm in the busy city. And the goats are so cute! Will definitely recommend this spot to others.
We enjoyed our stay at The Nest and we look forward to coming back again soon. Sara provided everything we needed (and more!) for a perfect visit to Atlanta.
Awesome!!!

Once your on the property you realize it’s a little piece of heaven. The little goats greet your arrival and the cottage is adorable. So beautiful inside and one of the most comfortable beds I have ever been in. You just sink into bliss. Perfect space for a getaway and everything you need is available. The Nest will always be our choice of accommodations.
Perfect location, very clean, and very nice! Communication was great and the goats were so cute! Would recommend!
This is such an amazing little get-away in the perfect location to everything great in ATL. Such great hosts, going back here for sure!
Adorable and perfect getaway. Clean and comfortable.

Sara and David’s Airbnb is lovely!! The place comes with everything you need and our check in process was so simple. The goats are adorable :) We had the best weekend here — great location and easy access to all Atlanta has to offer. Would recommend it to anyone coming to visit!
Peaceful gem tucked into historic neighborhoods.

We had a wonderful stay at the Nest! It was exactly as described and better. It was amazing how quiet and peaceful it was right in the middle of Atlanta. The accommodations are beautiful and well planned, the baby goats are adorable! David and Sara are very responsive and easy to work with. We can’t wait for our next stay!

Sara's place is a city treasure! Would give 12 stars if I could! It was such a surprise to find this small farm in the city with immaculate grounds and beautifully arranged space. Sara's place was easy to find and we had great communication from Sara that not only was helpful but so warm and friendly.
Location, location location! We couldn't believe how close to the Belt Line we were and just steps from the Zoo, Grant Park and East Atlanta! Just short walks from each but the bikes she provided were helpful for our longer adventures on the belt line.
The actual interior space was impressionable - was very clean, smelled great (no chemical smells! Big win!), comfy bed, just enough space to be very comfortable and the little porch outside that overlooked baby goats was dreamy with comfy seating to relax.
I can't say enough good about this little treehouse-esque destination. Will absolutely be back and recommend anyone who wants a safe, picturesque Atlanta experience to stay here - you will not be disappointed!
Wonderful quiet place to stay on a visit to Atlanta.
This was my second stay at this magical place- highly recommended!!!
A great hideaway spot! quiet, breezy and lots o f room. The cottage was perfect for 2. Beds and pillows were amazing. Hard to get out of bed. All the amenities of home were provided. We will be back

I have never before rated an AirBnB with 5-stars across the board, but Sara’s place is hands down my favorite Airbnb experience ever.
On a farm setting in the middle of the city and conveniently located, this romantic cottage is a perfect getaway for a couple or solo traveler. The king sized bed has plushy linens, the kitchenette is well-stocked, and personal touches throughout make it feel homey and welcoming. The porch is lovely.
I was seeking a writing retreat and found my bliss at Sara’s. If the sweet sounds of baby goats and children laughing spark joy for you, you will not want to miss this magical place.
Thank you, Sara! I hope to come back soon!

Amazing place! Communication to book + instructions to get in and navigate their property was so clear. A secluded and beautiful retreat right in the middle of their of their neighborhood, Grant Park. There are even baby goats as the neighbors on their property now. All around great stay.

Sara and David’s Nest was a fantastic place to stay. The stay was wonderful, and the personal touches were very thoughtful. They were very kind hosts, and I was glad I had a chance to interact with them in person. Also, getting to spend some time with the new baby goats was an unexpectedly awesome experience!

This one is a real gem! Tucked neatly in Grant Park , the Nest is a little oasis of country in an urban sea. The owners clearly have done their homework - everything is immaculately clean and uncluttered , yet still feels cozy and comfortable. The bungalow is not big , but it’s the perfect size for escapes to the city - the beltline is close by , as are lots of restaurants of a wide variety.
Top-notch communication by the owners make everything go seamlessly. We highly recommend this one!

A beautiful, secluded spot right by the Atlanta zoo and Grant Park! You could easily walk up to the zoo and avoid parking in the crowd. You are 5 minutes from major highways but you can’t hear much noise, very quiet setting. Very large deck for evening relaxation!! Affordable, and we will stay there again. Close to many trendy restaurant and shopping areas!

This was truly a five star experience! The host Sara is extremely responsive and made sure everything was perfect for our stay! Such a pleasant surprise to walk in and be greeted with a lovely hand written note and great snacks! She also provided an awesome amenity basket in case we forget any essentials!
They have really thought about all our needs during our stay! We came for our daughters baby shower and she even gifted a favorite book of hers to our future granddaughter!! The location is amazing and the grounds are outstanding! It was truly a private setting, yet so close to Grant Park! The king size bed was inviting and super comfortable! We will not hesitate to stay here again for all our future Atlanta trips!

Maureen’s place was perfect! We had the pleasure of meeting her and Michael upon arrival and they are both lovely and kind hosts. The airbnb is so cozy and had all the amenities you’d want. It’s decorated so nicely and the private outdoor deck is perfect for morning coffee. The location is exactly what we wanted- walking distance to the beltline and lots of restaurants. Would 100% stay here again!!!

Wow, I loved this place. The space is beautiful with thoughtful touches and is surrounded by a lovely, peaceful garden. The location is fantastic, walkable to the Beltline, Sweet Auburn and The King Center, restaurants, and transit (bus). Maureen was very communicative and helpful. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again!
Maureen’s place was lovely. It’s centrally located and was an easy walk to lots of restaurants in the neighborhood. Maureen was kind, warm, and friendly. We recommend!
Amazing place with a lovely garden and balcony that's great for relaxing, highly recommend!

It was perfect! We had a 36 hours layover in Atlanta and this place was perfect to rest a little bit en explore Atlanta. We airbnb had everything you need and it is really quiet. Maureen en Michael are really nice people and it was no problem to leave our backpacks after check out. Would totaly recomend!

Maureen and Michael were amazing hosts. Kind and friendly. Pictures do not do their home justice. Her gardens were absolutely stunning, I smiled everytime I walked through them. Her home and the rest of the neighborhood were breath taking. We were able to walk everywhere we needed and found tons of great places to eat and drink. We came for a show at the variety playhouse and it was just a short, gorgeous walk away. Thank you so much for having us, we had a great weekend and hope to be back!
Beautiful location and neighborhood. Walk to many restaurants - and Jimmy Carter Museum.

Maureen’s place was so beautiful and serene. While you’re here, it’s hard to believe that you’re in such a big, busy city. The location is wonderful, such a charming neighborhood and very walkable. We will definitely be back!
We had to cancel our second day because of planning on our part but look forward to staying with Maureen again

Maureen and Michael are lovely hosts, friendly and helpful. They give good tips on the environment.
Location is close to a very nice stretch of the Beltline (5 min walk).
Really a top location in Atlanta.

Maureen’s beautiful home exceeded our already high expectations. The back apartment was spacious, full of light, thoughtfully decorated, and set within a beautiful garden. The home is centrally located, but best of all, Maureen was a welcoming host who took the time to chat and make sure we felt at home. This stay felt like what AirBnB was meant to be—personal and providing an insight into local life, not a soulless and gentrifying hotel substitute.

Maureen and her husband are very warm hosts. We were happy to meet you and felt very comfortable at their place. The place is fantastically close to the Beltline. It is decorated with heart. Anytime again.
Thank you Maureen for hosting us and your lovely place. Thanks for the sweet touches, coffee and tea.
It was great.
Really wonderful hosts and great location.

We loved staying here! Beautifully decorated, amazing location (we could get everywhere we needed to on foot and using MARTA public transit), and Maureen and Michael made us feel right at home. The space is private but still connected to the rest of the house, so you might hear people on the other side of the dividing door. But all in all this was exactly the type of oasis we were looking for and helped us get an amazing introduction to Atlanta. Would highly recommend.
Great value in an excellent location. Very close to BELTLINE, Krog St, and Jimmy Carter Library.

Absolutely loved staying with Maureen! They have a beautiful home and we were so grateful they opened it up for us! The bed was SO comfortable, the space is eclectic and peaceful, and it’s walking distance from music venues and restaurants! We had a wonderful night and would love to come back!

Maureen’s place is top-notch. The location couldn’t be better, with amazing walkability to great destinations in every direction. The apartment itself is secluded in the back with a lovely view of the garden. The bed is comfy, shower works well, tv options, all the usual amenities you’d expect (though no kitchen per the listing). Maureen and her husband were super nice, easy to talk to and ask questions if we had them. There’s a dedicated parking spot out front, too, so no worries there. All in all, one of our best Airbnb experiences!

Everything was so lovely. We had a great time and it was so nice to meet y'all.
The Airbnb was great and a perfect place to stay.
Loved it! Thanks for the stay!
Amazing neighborhood friendly and sweet host. Will definitely be back!
Maureen was so helpful and friendly and her place was peaceful and lovely. We especially loved the deck with such a beautiful view. We will definitely book her place again!

We loved staying at Maureen's place in Inman Park. The location was a very convenient walk to local restaurants and the Krog Market with indoor restaurants and tap house. The neighborhood had a very boho and youthful feel which we loved. The street is very quiet with gorgeous gardens and tons of flowers in spring. it was a very nice home base for ATL!
Always a pleasure to stay at Maureen’s place! Hope to return soon!
Such a peaceful place with thoughtful design and gorgeous little garden. Hosts are lovely!
We loved Maureen’s stay. It was super close to Krog St market and the beltline. It was cozy, close to a ton of restaurants, it was quiet, very clean, room temperature was good.
Beautiful one night stay, great suburban location near a lot of walkable& pedestrian friendly food and shop options. Wonderful and unique suite for a good price, would definitely come back 🫶
Great reapomsive hosts very close and personable and very caring nice and clean stay
This was the best stay. Would do it again if I’m ever back in Atlanta. Thanks to Maureen and Micheal for such an amazing stay :)
Loved the neighborhood, the krog street market was only a few minutes walk away. We felt completely safe walking to the Marta station at 4:30 am to get to the airport.

This was our second time staying at Maureen's and I am sure we'll be back again! I highly recommend it, the neighborhood itself is lovely and it's also in walking or short driving distance to all the coolest places. It's super close to Krog Street Market, which we really enjoyed, and you can also take a little longer but very pleasant walk to Little 5 Points. Everything is super comfy and it was so nice that there were little extras like granola bars provided! We still haven't stayed long enough to hang out in the space but there is such a lovely porch and backyard too. :)
Nice quiet place but close to the fun!
beautiful stay! the backyard really is an oasis, wish we could’ve spent more time out there.
This place was so cute, clean and unique. It is such a nice little spot outside of the hustle and bustle of Atlanta. Maureen was very welcoming and responsive. We will definitely be back!
Maureen and Michael were very welcoming and helpful. They’re location is perfect for anyone that wants to be close to the Beltline and still feel tucked away.

Our hosts were there to meet us!
They helped with our luggage to our rental. Extremely friendly host☺️If forgot anything…Maureen had it there for you!! I slept on the sofa which was more comfortable than a lot of beds!! Great night sleep!! 5 ⭐️
Maureen was such a friendly and welcoming host. This space was walking distance from many great restaurants, bar, and shops, and the backyard area was a wonderful little oasis.
We always love to stay with Maureen. The absolute perfect Atlanta location

Maureen and Michael were perfect hosts and they were quick and responsive to our needs/communications. Great for our short weekend getaway as location was close to all and home had privacy with comforts. Would recommend!
Maureen and her beautiful home are both absolute gems of Atlanta! Her kindness and attention to detail is unmatched.
Great location, friendly hosts, and comfortable stay. Would highly recommend this airbnb and the neighbourhood!

Absolutely loved the Urban Oasis. If I ever move back to Atlanta I want to be neighbors with Maureen and Michael. Cozy, comfortable, relaxing space in a perfect location. The decor and little details made us feel very welcome. Book this for your visit.
I loved staying in the Urban Oasis, Maureen and Mike are extremely sweet and their space was peaceful and gorgeous! Definitely one of my favorite places to stay in the A!

Maureen's Urban Oasis was absolutely fantastic. I only regret not being able to spend more time there. The unit is nestled in a lovely area of town that has many wonderful walking options. The backyard, where the unit faces out to, is peaceful and serene and wonderful to wake up to. I would definitely seek to stay there again on future trips to ATL

We had a wonderful stay. Everything was as described and it was perfect for our needs. The neighborhood is very walkable and lovely. I appreciated the amenities left for us so we didn’t have to pack shampoo, soap, etc. Thanks, Maureen!
Beautiful and peaceful AirBnB in a cool and walkable part of Atlanta. Hosts were friendly and efficient, and gave good recommendations for Inman Park.

Maureen and her husband were great hosts! Pleasant and helpful. Everything was clean. Beautiful peaceful deck. We could walk to all kinds of restaurants and interesting places. We absolutely loved our stay!!
Had a wonderful weekend in Atlanta. This really was an Oasis!!

This is a hidden gem!!! We absolutely loved this place. It was convenient to everything. The neighborhood is quiet and we felt completely safe the entire time. Maureen was an excellent host and very responsive to all questions I asked. The place is super clean and had everything and more we needed. She goes above and beyond for her guests! We can’t wait to stay there again.

We loved our stay with Maureen and Michael! Their place was a only a few mins walk from Krog Street Market, the Belt Line, and other attractions, making it very convenient to get around. Michael greeted us at the door and made sure we had everything we needed. While we only stayed a night, we would come back to the urban oasis! It was a treat to stay at such a clean, convenient, and welcoming place.

Loved this place. Decorated in interesting, fun Southern style. Located in older, interesting neighborhood and walkable to nice bars, restaurants, coffee shops and Beltline. Would definitely stay there again.
Nice place
Cute, cozy, great location.
Excellent stay! The hosts are very friendly and welcoming and the apartment is beautiful! Will stay here again if we come back to Atlanta.
We had a great time here and will definitely be back!

This was my first Airbnb experience and Maureen was so kind and helpful. I didn’t know how things worked and she answered all my questions. The Airbnb was beautiful and clean with amazing plants! Maureen is clearly a lovely host with a green thumb.

Fantastic space! We’ve stayed at many Airbnbs, and this one tops the list. Colorful, eclectic space in a fun, walkable neighborhood. Another major plus for us - no clutter and plenty of space to put your stuff down. It’s so simple, and yet so many properties don’t do it right. Also, having laundry was super convenient. A+!
We had a wonderful stay at the Urban Oasis. Inman Park is a great neighborhood and we would definitely return here for any future visits to Atlanta!
I don't normally review AirBnB's, but this one was honestly excellent and really exceeded my expectations. This what most AirBnB's were like back in the prime of this app!

After driving through ATL traffic, it was such a treat to spend some time at the Urban Oasis. Maureen’s place is in a great location, and is quite walkable to local shops, restaurants, and bars. Its also nestled in the most charming neighborhood. We both loved our stay, and I’d recommend it to anyone.
Beautiful location and amazing host

We had a lovely time at the “Urban Oasis”! The neighborhood was peaceful and lovely. We walked to get coffee both mornings we were there. We were comfy and cozy in the space itself and definitely enjoyed our time there in between eating delicious foods around the city. We got to meet both Maureen and Michael, and they were so accommodating and sweet. If/when we come back, this will be on our top 3 places to stay. Thank you for such an enjoyable experience!

Excellent stay in a wonderful neighborhood. Just minutes to great restaurants and shops. My partner and I had the pleasure of meeting Maureen and her husband and they couldn’t have been more kind and easy to talk to.
The airbnb was clean, spacious, and roomy. Everything was exactly like the pictures and description.
I would recommend this spot to anyone looking for a stay in ATL!

We stayed here for 4 nights and loved our stay! The space is very cozy, and it was actually quite a bit bigger than I thought it would be. The patio outside is lovely, and the gas fire pit was really nice. Finally, the neighborhood was perfect - we walked around a ton, enjoyed the Beltline, and tried many of the food/drink options. We definitely recommend this place!

A really excellent and memorable Airbnb experience. The location/neighborhood and garden were beautiful, with very convenient walking access to the Beltline/Krog St Market/Old 4th Ward, MLK NHP, Jimmy Carter Presidential Library, Ponce City Market, and more. The suite was spacious and well-lit, super clean, and I really liked the decor/overall vibe. I was also just impressed with the many extra details that the hosts had considered to make it a comfortable stay, little things like the water purifier, tea and snacks, etc. I’m also very happy that I got a chance to meet and chat with Maureen and Michael during my stay, they were great friendly hosts.
A very relaxing stay that is walkable to a yummy crepe place.

A wonderful hideaway for being such a short walk to Krog Market, the beltline path, and MLK historical site. I met Maureen one afternoon and she was very welcoming, asking how the space was. The back porch offered a tranquil view out over the garden with a gurgling pond. It is a space connected to their main house with a large door in the living room area, yet locked and still private. The bed was comfy, the bathroom was stocked with hair care and body wash in case you forgot yours and there was a thoughtful selection of snacks & Brita pitcher in the living room as well. Highly recommend for the value, location, and care the hosts have put into creating a comfortable space!

Maureen is wonderful! And her urban oasis is such a lovely escape from everything. It's divided from the main house by a door but you would never really know. Well equipped as described, comfy bed and good shower. Maureen is a fantastic host, we would absolutely stay with her again on a return to Atlanta. So much to see, do and places to eat nearby, great location. Thank you!
It was as advertised. A very nice place and hospitable hosts.

Great place - very clean and comfortable, well-stocked, and the location couldn't be better. Maureen was great with responses and instructions and went out of her way to accommodate our schedule. Highly recommend this little gem.
A hidden gem! Hosts are very friendly. Quiet neighborhood.

Maureen and Micheal are the most amazing hosts you could find. They go above and beyond to help you, they are lovely and kind. The house is literally an urban oasis, you’ll feel like be in the jungle instead of one of the nicest neighborhoods in Atlanta. It’s also very well furnished and equipped. The location is great. A lovely neighborhood with so many options in 10 minutes walking distance and very close to Beltline and Dr. Martin Luther King Jr Park. If in Atlanta I’ll be back for sure!

Cute house in a beautiful, walkable neighborhood. Beautiful garden with a private deck that we loved having coffee on. Probably the best Airbnb I’ve stayed at in Atlanta, and I book one at least once a year. Would definitely stay here again.
Loved staying at Maureen’s place again! Looking forward to a future visit!

This is our second stay at this location and we just love it. The hosts are nice and friendly, the yard is beautiful and makes you feel like you are on a tropical island and not in the middle of the city. The space is exactly as described, cute, clean and so convenient. I love this neighborhood, it's safe and quiet but still very walkable to several areas. We enjoy going to the restaurants in Inman Park like the BeetleCat for oysters and the Krog street market and L5P for drinks. We will stay here anytime we come to Atlanta if possible.
Wonderful stay and very hospitable hosts. They went out of their way to replace a propane tank so that we could use their fire pit. All in all, would stay again!
This was my second time staying at Maureen's place and I hope it's always available when I am making my way through the area!
Such a cozy place, I wish I could stay longer.
What a gorgeous oasis in Inman Park neighborhood! Maureen and Mike were kind and welcoming hosts.

Lovely place close to many amenities. Maureen was a lovely host.

Where to start? Our hosts Maureen and Michael really went the extra mile for us ensuring we safely arrived at the property late at night.

Lovely home in an awesome walkable location! Perfect, clean and comfortable stay!

Maureen's place was great ! Loved the location being walkable to the Krog Street Market and The Eastern music venue. Check in was quick and easy and Maureen was very friendly when we met her. Very comfortable stay

Clean, comfortable and friendly. Wonderful garden and balcony.
Beautiful space with everything you could want or need, walking distance to shopping, food, and MARTA, lovely neighborhood, kind, communicative hosts - would 100% recommend!

This is a paradise in the city. I can't say enough for this location and will certainly stay here again. The unit was clean, private, beautiful, and peaceful. unit as described - good communication
